lead_paragraph: In the debate over whether to extend the Bush-era tax cuts for the wealthy, a progressive group is unleashing a familiar figure to lobby President Obama: Mr. Obama himself.
snippet: In an ad that will start airing this week, the Progressive Change Campaign Committee pushes President Obama to fight Republicans on the Bush tax cuts.
abstract: In an ad that will start airing this week, the Progressive Change Campaign Committee pushes President Obama to fight Republicans on the Bush tax cuts.
